translated: Jātaka
Ten-&-Twelve
The Four Gates
The Matted-Hair Ascetic’s Birth Story
“Adorned with earrings and a necklace,
wearing a garland, anointed with yellow sandalwood,
you raise your arms and cry out,

analyzed: vana majjhe kim dukkhitaḥ tuva  sovaṇṇa mayaḥ pabhassaraḥ
translated: in the middle of the forest, why are you so miserable?”🔽“A golden chariot has appeared to me,
a jeweled chariot,
but I can’t find a pair of wheels,
and because of this misery, I’m giving up my life.”🔽“Made of gold, jewels,

analyzed: sovaṇṇa mayam maṇī maya  loha mayam atha
translated: iron, or silver,
I’ll build you a chariot,
and I’ll give you a pair of wheels.”
“That brahmin told him,
‘The moon and sun are brothers here.
My chariot is made of gold,
and it shines with a pair of wheels.’
“‘You’re a fool, brahmin,
you who seek what can’t be found.
I think you’ll die,

analyzed: na hi tvam lacchasi canda sūriye
translated: for you won’t get the moon and sun.’
“‘The coming and going is seen,
and the colors are the paths here.
But the dead are not seen,
Who is more foolish than I?”

analyzed: saccam kho vadesi māṇava  aham eva bālyataro
translated: “It is true, young man, that I am🔽more foolish than you.

original: Candaṁ viya dārako rudaṁ,🔽Petaṁ kālakatābhipatthaye.🔽Ādittaṁ vata maṁ santaṁ,🔽ghatasittaṁva pāvakaṁ;
analyzed: candam dārakaḥ ruda  petam kālakata abhipatthaye  ādittam vata mam santa  pāvaka
translated: Like a child crying for the moon,🔽I was hoping for the dead to come back to life.🔽I was burning with grief,
like a house on fire,🔽but you have sprinkled me with water
and extinguished all my grief.

analyzed: abbahī vata me salla  yama asi hadayaḥ sita
translated: The dart that was lodged in my heart,

analyzed: yaḥ me soka paretassa  putta sokam apānudi
translated: which was causing me pain,
the grief that was consuming me,🔽the grief for my son, you have removed.🔽Now that dart has been pulled out,
I am free from grief, clear-minded.
I do not grieve or weep,
having heard your words, young man.”
The Matted-hair Ascetic with Earrings Birth Story is the eleventh.
